title: Depression - The Misunderstood Epidemic
description: Take an intimate look at how depression affects its victims and their families. Explore through firsthand accounts how depression can happen to anyone regardless of age, race, or socioeconomic background. Follow along as one by one the following topics are addressed: symptoms, suicide, the stigma and lack of understanding, the stress in families and relationships, and the loss of ability to work. Also discussed are the pros and cons of medication, different types of therapy, and more.
